description: Database connection module requires the base NestJS project structure.
mitigation_plan: Task is sequential and assigned to the same developer.
impact_if_delayed: Cascading delay across all database-dependent tasks.

description: The global `JwtAuthGuard` cannot be implemented without the underlying `JwtStrategy`.
mitigation_plan: Task is sequential and assigned to the same developer.
impact_if_delayed: Delays all API endpoint security implementation.

description: On-demand user creation in the database requires the `users` table to exist via migration.
mitigation_plan: Task is sequential and assigned to the same developer.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks implementation of all user-scoped APIs.

description: The sandbox execution logic cannot be written until the `isolated-vm` library is successfully set up and deployable within the Lambda environment.
mitigation_plan: A technical spike was performed (implicitly by pulling into Sprint 1). Ample buffer time is allocated in the sprint plan.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire custom mode execution feature.

description: The API endpoint for executing a custom formula cannot be fully implemented until the target Lambda function exists to be invoked.
mitigation_plan: Define the Lambda's event payload (API contract) early, allowing the NestJS service to be developed against a mocked Lambda interface.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the core functionality of the custom modes feature.

description: Conflict resolution logic must be built on top of the batch update endpoint.
mitigation_plan: Tasks are sequential and assigned to the same developer.
impact_if_delayed: The offline sync feature would be incomplete and prone to data corruption.
